title: Aurora Wallpapers.
content:
# Aurora Wallpapers

Welcome to Aurora Wallpapers, your source for stunning desktop backgrounds featuring the mesmerizing Northern Lights. Our collection includes a variety of high-quality photographs showcasing the green and purple hues of this natural phenomenon swirling in the night sky.

Whether you're looking to add some color to your computer screen or simply admire the beauty of the Aurora Borealis, our wallpapers are sure to impress. We update our selection regularly, so be sure to check back often for new additions.

All of our wallpapers are available for free download and use, so feel free to share them with friends and family. We hope you enjoy browsing our collection and finding the perfect Aurora wallpaper for your desktop.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"A photograph of the Northern Lights, with the green and purple hues swirling in the night sky."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
